title: Normal day in League of Legends :D
body:
Please, take it with a smile at your face, because I know I have one while I am posting this :D.

Just look at thost screenshots below, and admire the skill, the nobleness (if that is a word) of that player :D.

https://imgur.com/a/GIO6CaA
https://imgur.com/a/LTqLmov



Have fun and have a nice X-mas xD.

replies.body:
thank you for your wishes! I'm still sick and will be sick for X-mas!

as someone who has took off their enter key from their keyboard and only clicks on the text box to talk, I share your feelings.

its best fun watching teammates and enemies argue.
